targets.query:
JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize avg(Cycletime_Value) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Cycletime_Design_Target
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize count() by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Cycletime_Value
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where Cycletime_Slow == true
| summarize sum(Cycletime_Slow) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where Cycletime_Invalid == true
| summarize count() by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize sum(Cycletime_Overtime_Value) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where Cycletime_Invalid == false
| summarize by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Cycletime_Value
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize min(Cycletime_Value) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize avg(Cycletime_Value) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize max(Cycletime_Value) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize sum(Cycletime_Value) by bin(Timestamp, 1m)
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| where Cycletime_Invalid == true
| summarize by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Cycletime_Invalid_Target
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Cycletime_Value
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Cycletime_Design_Target
| order by Timestamp asc

JPH
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| where Device_Alias == $AssetID
| summarize by bin(Timestamp, 1m), Cycletime_Invalid_Target
| order by Timestamp asc
